root.pub-comments: Many of these languages are mutually unintelligible. At one time, there was considered to only be one language in this region. Speakers: 12325
root.geography: Spoken along the Columbia River, Puget Sound, Shoalwater Bay, Eastern Vancouver Island and into Montana
